categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starfighter classes

nodes.text: The Commerce Guild bomber was a type of bomber of the Commerce Guild that served in the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. During the war, Commerce Guild bombers and Commerce Guild corvettes supported the larger Recusant-class Commerce Guild destroyers and Diamond-class cruisers as they defended planets off the Perlemian Trade Route such as Castell, Escarte, Felucia, Mooga, and Minntooine.
